verbs.description: [ARG0: Congressional Democrats] [V: blasted] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday night] [ARG2: for circumventing Congress in authorizing U.S. strikes against Syria] , [ARGM-ADV: calling it " unconstitutional " and questioning the strategy] .
